nodes.bodyText:
Rename to attemptToQueueAndShowInAppMessages()
What if an IAM is already showing and this fires?
inside checkConditionsAndDisplayFirstIAMQueued we check for IAM showing
regarding changing the name to attemptToQueueAndShowInAppMessages, in that method the message was already queue, maybe attemptToShowInAppMessage?
Change to WARNING and explain that IAMs will not be shown
Change to WARNING and explain that IAMs will not be shown
Change to WARNING and explain that IAMs will not be shown
I will prefer to have this warning independent from IAM, because this can be potentially be used in another place, no necessary only on IAM. I will add a log on the IAMController regarding this
